summary: Millions infected, countless dead, and the lucky few survivors struggling to find the last safe corner for humanity.
cast: Douglas Chapman|Kyra Zagorsky|Giles Panton|Philip Granger|Christopher Jordan Lee|Karina Carreck|Dave Cote|Katherine Gauthier|Kevin Stark|Curtis Lum|Graeme McComb|Patrick Sabongui|Paul Lazenby|Dalias Blake|Bruce Crawford|Brian McBride|Ryan Hesp|Rik Kiviaho|Shawn Robidoux|Ray Chan|Nickolas Baric|Lloyd Adams|Justin Doran
title: Toxin
